Class SimulatedDevice

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.device.sim.SimulatedDevice
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Device
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimulatedCentrifuge, SimulatedGPIBDevice, SimulatedMicroscope, SimulatedMultimeter, SimulatedOscilloscope, SimulatedPHMeter, SimulatedPressureGauge, SimulatedSpectrometer, SimulatedTemperatureProbe, SimulatedUSBDevice, SimulatedVitalSignsMonitor, SimulatedVotingMachine
public abstract class SimulatedDevice extends Object implements Device
Abstract base class for simulated devices with full metadata support.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
